plugin.description.long: Design your custom API's (or custom reports / or custom views) directly from the Strapi CMS admin panel. Simply select the fields you need to show, enter a valid slug and let the plugin magically create the routes, controllers & services for you. Very easy to create & even easier to maintain.
plugin.description.short: Design your custom API's directly from the Strapi CMS admin panel.
plugin.name: Custom API
